message.content:
Based on the given lineage relationships, we can derive the following chain: Anna is an ancestor of Alexander (from point 6), and Alexander is part of a descendant chain from Jean: Jean is an ancestor of Ann (point 2), Ann is an ancestor of Megan (point 7), Megan is an ancestor of Paul (point 1), Paul is an ancestor of Ruth (point 5), Ruth is an ancestor of Judith (point 4), and Judith is an ancestor of Alexander (point 3). Since Anna is not included in this chain and is an ancestor of Alexander, Anna must be an ancestor of Jean. Therefore, Jean is Anna's descendant.

<ANSWER>2</ANSWER>
